body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Elijah Bailey and the customer's name is Susan Taylor.  The conversation is about a random business (a Accounting Firm ) and is a conversation about billing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good day! My name is Elijah Bailey, and I represent Accurate Accounting Firm. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Elijah, I'm Susan Taylor. I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed with my latest bill.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Susan. Let's go through it together. Can you please provide me with your account number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And for verification purposes, could you also provide me with your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it is March fifteenth, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Susan. I see your account, and I can help break down the charges for you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That would be really helpful. I just want to make sure everything is correct.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely! I’ll walk you through each line item so that you feel confident about it.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate it, Elijah. This has been quite stressful for me.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: No problem at all, Susan. Thank you for your time today. I’m here to help you anytime you need.
